about_the_game:
Battle Fantasia Original Soundtrack

Songs are placed in a separate folder, in your Steam install directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\Battle Fantasia Revised Edition\Battle Fantasia Original Soundtrack\

* Format: MP3
* Soundtrack length: 44m 43s
* Total size: 102 MB
* 44100 Hz sample rate
* 320 kpbs bitrate

Tracklist:


1) Main Title
2) Character Select
3) Prateness
4) Aden
5) La Concorde
6) Humperdinck Forest
7) Coyori-Tei
8) Sarai Cave
9) Donvalve & Co.
10) Dool Desert
11) Moschata
12) Last Battle
13) Deathbringer
14) Continue
15) Game over
16) Fanfare
17) End Credits
18) Prologue

Music Producer & Composer

Suemura Kennosuke

Contents Producer

伊藤 泰則 (YELLOW TUNE TRACKS)

Music Director & Rec/Mix Engineer

新堀 崇 (STUDIO PJ)

Recording Studio

STUDIO PJ

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6400 / Pentium 4 651 / Celeron D 352
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 7900 GS 以上 / ATI Radeon X1600Pro / X1300LE
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
